testcase.name: DBA.TR05
testcase.description: DBA.TR05: gsd:ReportingPeriodStartDate must specify the same date as period startDate in the context of gsd:IdentificationNumberCvrOfReportingEntity.

variation.name: Invalid
variation.description: ReportingPeriodStartDate value does not match the PeriodStart value in the context of IdentificationNumberCvrOfReportingEntity
